entry.title: 🔥🔥🔥New Publication –> Implicit Counterfactual Learning for Audio-Visual Segmentation

link.title: 🔥🔥🔥New Publication –> Implicit Counterfactual Learning for Audio-Visual Segmentation

entry.content: Recently, the paper “Implicit Counterfactual Learning for Audio-Visual Segmentation” submitted by MIG member Mingfeng Zha was accepted by ICCV2025. Congratulations to Mingfeng Zha and all the co-authors!!!

author.name: Mingfeng Zha, Tianyu Li, Guoqing Wang, Peng Wang, Yangyang Wu, Yang Yang, Hengtao Shen

entry.summary: Recently, the paper “Implicit Counterfactual Learning for Audio-Visual Segmentation” submitted by MIG member Mingfeng Zha was accepted by ICCV2025. Congratulations to Mingfeng Zha and all the co-authors!!!
